posts.postText: It is my birthday on Friday, the 17th. Kry's is on the 19th (Sunday). For some reason about 4 movies are coming out on the 17th, I dont know why. They love me. We expect gifts. Brink Pre-Order would be nice for me. I'm not sure about Kry.

Dum, my gift to you is this drawing of a Spider I found on the Internetz

 http://www.nerdyshirts.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/S/p/SpiderLARGE.jpg 

You don't have to say thank you, I know how much you love it.
Is it a guy or a girl spider?
Its a male spider.
no fair, dum gets the fucking spider? I WANTED THE FUCKING SPIDQSERGTFAYWSZ4EYJRWAt sUFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

Here Kryzoid,
 http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_oYbvl81ybS0/SRz82IEhqzI/AAAAAAAAAfk/8cpq20ck6Cg/s200/spider8.jpg 

Now this means you each have to get me something huge for my birthday. :3

>> Now this means you each have to get me something   huge   for my birthday. :3 
 http://i54.tinypic.com/4ggsop.jpg 

Early present FTW? :D
PERFUCT. Now I finally have something to kill insects with. :D

Now Dum still owes me a presunt
